Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,823Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 178

Summary: Damian al Ghul became the Demon's head when he was 19 years old. entry.title: Be My Breath (Through The Deep, Deep Water)
entry.summary:
Author: Autumn_Bitters (Winterlynne_Norvic)

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,579Chapters: 4/4Kudos: 54

Summary: Damian may be in love with him, but he does have enough respect for himself to not let that love continuously lead him blindly into more hurt and unfulfilled expectations. At least not today. Today he refuses to settle for this torture, because Damian does not want him for only a night. Nor a day. A week. A month. A year. Only forever will do, and forever does not sit behind that door. Forever will not come if he lets Richard kiss him, only to push Damian away any time a kiss might become more and he remembers his morals, or whatever his excuses are masquerading as. Damian is not a good person, but he is still a person. … Or, Dick and Damian leave behind the vigilante life to figure out who they are away from Gotham and five times Dick makes everything a lot more complicated between himself and Damian on their trip, plus one where they come back home and finally figure their shit out.

entry.title: Vows Are Spoken To Be Broken
entry.summary:
Author: arakhnoidsilk

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,797Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 23

Summary: And suddenly, he felt this rush of affection that bloomed in time to become much more than he had promised himself. He knew there was something more. He couldn't put it on the kid's shoulders; he was too young and grieving. Everything was changing right before his eyes, and Dick didn't have the heart to do anything but comfort the little one. He did anything he could: soft words and reassurances, long-lasting hugs, fleeting and comforting touches, together with headpats and kisses on the crown of the kid's head. He almost acted like he was the father.So it wasn't strange to see Damian asking for more attention at the end of patrolling. It actually became a norm for them to cuddle up in bed together and then fall asleep. Dick always made sure that nothing… Too intimate happened, and that was it.What was strange, however, was how Damian was nervously staring at him from behind the doorframe, almost as if he wasn't sure he was going to be welcomed.
